hero.title: ABOUT
hero.subtitle: STUDIO PRECHT
hero.description: Architecture & Design Studio founded on the principles of innovation, sustainability, and human-centered design.

story.title: OUR STORY
content: Studio Precht was founded by Chris Precht to explore the relationship between architecture and nature. We strive to design spaces that nurture well-being and embrace sustainability.
From our Austrian studio, we develop residential and public projects that are both environmentally responsible and emotionally resonant.
Our approach combines innovative design thinking with traditional craftsmanship, creating timeless structures that harmonize with their natural surroundings.

architect.title: MEET THE ARCHITECT
architect.name: CHRIS PRECHT
bio: Chris brings a passion for sustainable architecture, blending creativity and ecological responsibility into every project. His philosophy is rooted in creating spaces that connect people with the natural world.
With over a decade of experience, Chris has developed a unique approach that balances aesthetic beauty with environmental consciousness.

principles.title: SUSTAINABLE DESIGN
principles.description: Every project integrates eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient solutions to minimize environmental impact while maximizing comfort.

principles.title: BIOPHILIC ARCHITECTURE
principles.description: We believe in the healing power of nature and incorporate natural elements to create spaces that promote well-being and connection.

cta.title: READY TO START YOUR PROJECT?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can create sustainable, beautiful spaces together.
